channel.title: Server Status Page
channel.description:
Hello,
when i put my server on the server status page it won't get in the list? i'm using VPS so i'm adding the server via my vps but when i do add server it says: server is already posted.
when i do edit server then it says: you don't have posted a server yet ?
btw i added the server 6 hours ago

item.title: Server Status Page
item.dc:creator: @Stynn Stynn
item.description:
@Stynn wrote:

James-RevolutionX:

Try adding the server onto your normal computer and not on your VPS, that way you can add it but it will be hosted via VPS.

so i need to add my server on the statuspage when its online on my normal computer, when its added i need to run it via VPS?

Read full topic

item.title: Server Status Page
item.dc:creator: @James-RevolutionX James-RevolutionX
item.description:
@James-RevolutionX wrote:

Try adding the server onto your normal computer and not on your VPS, that way you can add it but it will be hosted via VPS.

Read full topic
